channel.title: Startup on Raja Sardar
channel.description: Recent content in Startup on Raja Sardar

item.title: Why and How I Started HackerLand ?
item.description: During a long weekend at home, I felt that I was missing something very important in my life: a productive environment and a community that I had in college. Many others likely felt the same, all trying to stay innovative and productive in an environment that lacked those elements. From this simple idea, we started HackerLand with the motto of creating a community for designers, innovators, and programmers all in one place.
